config.ktnwynnmacros.general.force.long:
Force-Cast Mode.
This indicates how the mod should act when
the existing cast sequence doesn't match
the desired spell.

§cNone§f: §7Force-Cast is off.
§aWait for Timeout§f: §7The mod will queue up the
  spell for when the cast sequence expires.
§aBlock Manual§f: §7Blocks the normal spell cast
  button (LMB for archer. RMB for others).
config.ktnwynnmacros.general.smart.long:
Check current spell queue and if possible,
finish of the spell if it matches.
config.ktnwynnmacros.general.interact.lo:
For Force-Cast=Block Manual
Allows interaction with blocks like bank,
crafting stations or loot chests.

Also allows interaction with NPCs.
config.ktnwynnmacros.timings.base.long:
This is the delay between each spell input.
100ms seem like a stable delay, but
you may tweak it if you feel like.
